import React,{ useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const CreateActivity = ()=>{ let $countries = useSelector((state)=>state.countries) let [check, setCheck] = useState({country:''}) let [act, setAct] = useState({ name:'', difficulty:1, duration:30, season:'', countries:[] }) let handleChange = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setAct((prev)=>({ ...prev, countries:[...e.target.value,act.countries], [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } let handleCountries = (e)=>{ if(check.country.includes(e.target.value)){ console.log('ya esta en el estado') }else{ setCheck({ country:[...check.country,e.target.value] }) } } return( <>
Activity create











countries selectd
{check.country}



) }
